title: Merge pull request #12 from xyzz/ios-fixes

title: Merge pull request #9 from rscullin/ios-fixes
message:
Merge pull request #9 from rscullin/ios-fixes

Add iOS Build Directions + iOS Fixes

title: Remove cruft from Android manifest
message:
Remove cruft from Android manifest

This should fix a crash that might have affected some users

title: Android: Force-remove WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission
message:
Android: Force-remove WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission

the local notification plugin requires that for version of Android that we
don't support, so we don't need that. Forcibly remove it. This requires
removing it from the plugin's manifest in
plugins/de.appplant.cordova.plugin.local-notification/plugin.xml

See https://github.com/katzer/cordova-plugin-local-notifications/commit/901a844e37016a6f202ab7b8b840c6979c29cf6d

title: Rebuild manifest things, update plugins
message:
Rebuild manifest things, update plugins

This removes the android.permission.GET_TASKS permission which
seems to be no longer required

Splash screen now fades, but the default of 3s is so long that it
looks really ugly with autoconnect, so reduce duration to .5s
which looks quite nice imho
